title: PM stresses common man’s access to health services
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 24 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Thursday stressed the need for steps to ensure access of common man to basic health services.
The prime minister expressed these views in a meeting with Parliamentary Secretary Ministry of National Health Services Dr Nosheen Hamid here at the PM House.
The meeting focused on the amount allocated for healthcare in the budget and the related initiatives including the Insaf Sehat Card.
Dr Nosheen Hamid lauded the prime minister’s successful strategy of smart lockdown that helped control the cases of coronavirus in the country.
